mapper.select: select kj.periods as periods , kj.status as status , case when kj.status = '1' then kj.bet_time when g.system_open_type = 'Y' then c.pre_time else kj.pre_time end as bet_open_time , case when kj.status = '1' then CONCAT(kj.num1,'+',kj.num2,'+',kj.num3,'=',kj.sum_num) CONCAT(kj.num1,'+',kj.num2,'+',kj.num3,'+',kj.num4,'+',kj.num5,'=',kj.sum) CONCAT(kj.num1,'+',kj.num2,'+',kj.num3,'+',kj.num4,'+',kj.num5,'+',kj.num6,'+',kj.num7,'+',kj.num8,'+',kj.num9,'+',kj.num10) when g.system_open_type = 'Y' then CONCAT(c.pre_sum_1,'+',c.pre_sum_2,'+',c.pre_sum_3,'=',(c.pre_sum_1+c.pre_sum_2+c.pre_sum_3)) CONCAT(c.pre_num1,'+',c.pre_num2,'+',c.pre_num3,'+',c.pre_num4,'+',c.pre_num5,'=',(pre_num1+pre_num2+pre_num3+pre_num4+pre_num5)) CONCAT(c.pre_num1,'+',c.pre_num2,'+',c.pre_num3,'+',c.pre_num4,'+',c.pre_num5,'+',c.pre_num6,'+',c.pre_num7,'+',c.pre_num8,'+',c.pre_num9,'+',c.pre_num10) else '' end as open_result , kj.count_money as count_money , kj.win_money as win_money ,g.game_id as game_id ,g.game_name as game_name ,g.game_type as game_type ,g.system_open_type as system_open_type from ${betkjTableName} kj inner join sys_game g on g.game_id = kj.game_id left join ${openCodeTableName} c on c.game_id = kj.game_id and c.periods = kj.periods where 1 = 1 and kj.status = #{status} and kj.game_id = #{gameId} and kj.periods = #{periods} order by kj.periods desc

select gameRecode.game_id AS game_id ,gameRecode.game_name AS game_name ,gameRecode.periods AS periods ,date_format(gameRecode.record_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS record_time ,brecode.count_money AS count_money ,gameRecode.win_money AS win_money ,brecode.bet_money AS bet_money ,gameRecode.status AS status from ${betRecordTableName} gameRecode inner join( select br.user_id as user_id ,br.periods as periods ,br.game_id as game_id ,count(*) as count_money ,sum(br.money) as bet_money from bet_record br where br.is_delete = 0 and br.user_id = #{userId} and br.game_id = #{gameId} group by br.user_id,br.periods,br.game_id )brecode on brecode.user_id = gameRecode.user_id and brecode.game_id = gameRecode.game_id and brecode.periods = gameRecode.periods where gameRecode.is_delete = 0 and gameRecode.user_id = #{userId} and gameRecode.game_id = #{gameId}
and DATE_FORMAT(gameRecode.record_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{filterDay}

select game_id as game_id , game_name AS game_name , periods as periods , win_money as win_money , status as status , case when status = '1' then CONCAT(n1,'+',n2,'+',n3,'=',sum_num) CONCAT(num1,'+',num2,'+',num3,'+',num4,'+',num5,'=',sum) CONCAT(num1,'+',num2,'+',num3,'+',num4,'+',num5,'+',num6,'+',num7,'+',num8,'+',num9,'+',num10) else '' end as open_code ,case when status = 1 and win_money > 0 then '1' else '0' end AS open_flg from ${betRecordTableName} where game_id = #{gameId} and user_id = #{userId} and periods = #{periods}
mapper.delete: delete from bet_record where is_robot = '1' and DATE(record_time) < CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY
